data.name: RPG Sounds - Graveyard - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Graveyard is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Beware Of The Spirits
  • Beyond The Fog
  • Violent Hallucinations

Ambient Sounds
  • Graveyard Eerie Wind

SFX
  • Bone Creature Fall (6)
  • Creature Steps Shackles (6)
  • Dungeon Room Next Door Activity (9)
  • Gargoyle Transform Fly (4)
  • Graveyard Drag Tombstone (4)
  • Graveyard Zombie Hand Wake (6)
  • Horror Squeaky Cell Door Slam (4)
  • Horror Squeaky Hinge Distant (4)

data.short_description: Graveyard is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
